summary: An ordinary hunter accidentally helps a criminal to escape from his accomplices. Two completely different men tries to reach a distant city, but the price of life will be truly terrifying.
cast: Vladislav Toldykov|Denis Shvedov|Sergey Belyaev|Aleksey Komashko|Sergey Sosnovskiy|Konstantin Strelnikov|Sergey Zharkov
title: Zhit
